description.en: Committed to environmental conservation and sustainable development across India.
description.hi: Bharat bhar mein paryavaran sanrakshan aur sustainable development ke liye pratibaddh.

mission.en: To create a greener and cleaner India through community participation and sustainable practices.
mission.hi: Samudayik bhaagidari aur sustainable practices ke madhyam se ek harit aur swachh Bharat banana.

description.en: Our annual report detailing achievements and financials for the fiscal year 2022-23.
description.hi: Vittiya varsh 2022-23 ke liye hamaari upalabdhiyon aur vittiya vivaranon ka varnan karne wali hamaari varshik report.

description.en: Dedicated to the conservation and rejuvenation of the Ganga river and its tributaries.
description.hi: Ganga nadi aur uski sahayak nadiyon ke sanrakshan aur kayakalp ke liye samarpit.

mission.en: To ensure effective abatement of pollution and rejuvenation of the river Ganga.
mission.hi: Ganga nadi ke pradushan ko prabhavi dhang se kam karna aur uske kayakalp ko sunishchit karna.

description.en: Community group in Delhi focused on urban afforestation and waste management.
description.hi: Dilli mein shehri vanikaran aur kachra prabandhan par kendrit samudayik samuh.

description.en: Volunteer group working on cleaning and preserving the Ganga river in Varanasi.
description.hi: Varanasi mein Ganga nadi ki safai aur sanrakshan par kaam karne wala swayamsevi samuh.

description.en: Join us for a day of planting native trees in Delhi's Yamuna Biodiversity Park to combat air pollution and increase green cover.
description.hi: Vayu pradushan se nipatne aur harit aavaran badhane ke liye Dilli ke Yamuna Biodiversity Park mein deshi ped lagane ke liye hamaare saath judein.

title.hi: Dashashwamedh Ghat par Ganga safai abhiyan

description.en: Volunteer for cleaning the sacred ghats of Varanasi and raising awareness about river conservation.
description.hi: Varanasi ke pavitra ghathon ki safai aur nadi sanrakshan ke baare mein jagrukta badhane ke liye swayamsevak banein.

description.en: A comprehensive guide to composting at home in urban Indian settings.
description.hi: Bhartiya shehri settings mein ghar par composting ke liye ek vyapak guide.

title.en: Water Conservation Techniques for Indian Homes
title.hi: Bhartiyon ke liye jal sanrakshan techniques

description.en: Learn practical water-saving techniques suitable for Indian households.
description.hi: Bhartiya parivaron ke liye upyukt vyavaharik jal bachat techniques seekhein.
